JobFullDesc: Microsoft 365 (M365) continues to be a significant driver of Microsoft’s success across the commercial landscape. The FastTrack service offerings help customers successfully deploy and drive user adoption of M365 solutions. When customers purchase eligible M365 licenses, the FastTrack benefit is included at no additional cost for the life of their subscriptions. The FastTrack team helps customers enable more effective teamwork, migrate data, and protect their organizations from cybersecurity threats and keep devices and apps up to date.Within the broader FastTrack framework, the FastTrack Ready Partner (FRP) program ( https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/partners/fasttrack) drives high-touch engagement with select partners to deliver the FastTrack benefit and value-added services to M365 customers. These partners are eligible to earn a variety of usage-based incentives for assisting customers. The FRP program motion enables scale and increased velocity to business goals through a robust, mutually beneficial ecosystem of Microsoft FastTrack, FRPs and customers.The Modern Work Partner Experience (MWPX) team is responsible for managing specialty and pilot partner programs focused on M365 and Modern Work business priorities including FastTrack Ready Partner (FRP). We are adding a Program Manager to our team to lead the Incentive Operations (IO) function.
